infos.value: In Match Battles, you can face off against other players much like in the Arena. However, these battles are much fiercer.
Gain a strong command of your fighting power and tactics, then try your hand at toppling the other expert players who have gathered for the chance at victory.

• Match Battles •
There are three types of Match Battles: Class Matches, Free Matches, and Friendly Matches.

• Class Matches •
This battle mode is only available for limited durations. Compete against other players who are of the same class.

• Free Matches •
You can compete against other players regardless of your class.

• Friendly Matches •
You can compete against friends or other specific players.
All three battle modes are operated manually by the player.
Proceed to a tutorial on Match Battles?
